mapper.sql: USER_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, PWD, ERR_LGN_CNT, RSET_PSW_MARK, IDT_TYPE, IDT_NO, EMP_ID, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_TIME, REMARK, ADDR, CARD_NAME, EMAIL, POSITION, PHONE, MOBILE, SEX, STAT, CLOSE_DATE, HEAD_IMG
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from sys_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_user (USER_ID, ORG_ID, USER_NAME, PWD, ERR_LGN_CNT, RSET_PSW_MARK, IDT_TYPE, IDT_NO, EMP_ID, USER_TYPE, LOGIN_IP, LOGIN_DATE, LOGIN_TIME, REMARK, ADDR, CARD_NAME, EMAIL, POSITION, PHONE, MOBILE, SEX, STAT, CLOSE_DATE, HEAD_IMG ) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errLgnCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{rsetPswMark,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idtType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idtNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{loginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stat,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{closeDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
